name: Capt. Helena Vance
description: A former astronaut and a propulsion physicist, Capt. Vance brings unparalleled expertise and vision to Orion, leading the team towards uncharted territories.

name: Dr. Hiroshi Nakamura
description: A genius in aerospace engineering, Dr. Nakamura's innovations form the backbone of Orion's groundbreaking spacecrafts and aerial vehicles.

name: Leo Rodriguez
description: With a penchant for blending aesthetics with functionality, Leo ensures that every Orion product is not just effective but also a piece of art.

name: Ava O'Connell
description: Managing the intricate logistics of aerospace projects is Ava's forte. Her meticulous planning ensures that missions are executed flawlessly.

name: Dr. Imani Okoro
description: A space historian and a former NASA educator, Dr. Okoro shapes the curriculum, ensuring that the academy produces the best minds in aerospace.
